pages.text: Figuring out the controls in a modpack can be difficult, so here's a few useful ones listed!

pages.title: Item Zoom
pages.text: Using $(5)$(k:itemzoom.toggle)$(reset) while hovering over an item in JEI will give a larger picture on the right side of the screen. Hover over other blocks and items to see a close up!

pages.title: Vertical Slab Placement
pages.text: Turning on $(5)$(k:doubleslabs.key.toggleVerticalSlabPlacement)$(reset) will let you place vertical slabs all of the time, without holding shift. Hitting $(5)$(k:doubleslabs.key.toggleVerticalSlabPlacement)$(reset) again will turn it off

pages.title: Portable Crafting
pages.text: With a Crafting Table in your inventory press $(5)$(k:charm.openCraftingTable)$(reset) to access a 3x3 crafting window.
